results.name: Sum of prime digits of n-th prime.
example: a(6)=3 because sum of prime digits of Prime[6]=13 is 3.
xref: Sum of nonprime digits (1, 4, 6, 8, 9) of n-th prime: A104251. Primes A000040: sum of digits of primes: A007605.
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Feb 26 2005
